nodes.documentation:
@title CompanyAccessControl
@notice This contract defines organizational roles and permissions.
nodes.name: CompanyAccessControl

nodes.documentation: @notice ContractUpgrade is the event that will be emitted if we set a new contract address
nodes.name: ContractUpgrade

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by the CEO
nodes.name: onlyCEO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by the CFO
nodes.name: onlyCFO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by the COO
nodes.name: onlyCOO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by C-level execs
nodes.name: onlyCLevel

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by CEO or CFO
nodes.name: onlyCEOOrCFO

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function only callable by CEO or COO
nodes.name: onlyCEOOrCOO

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets a new CEO
@param _newCEO - the address of the new CEO
nodes.name: setCEO

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets a new CFO
@param _newCFO - the address of the new CFO
nodes.name: setCFO

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets a new COO
@param _newCOO - the address of the new COO
nodes.name: setCOO

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets a new withdrawalAddress
@param _newWithdrawalAddress - the address where we'll send the funds
nodes.name: setWithdrawalAddress

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress
@dev We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet.
nodes.name: withdrawBalance

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice called by any C-level to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @notice called by the CEO to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause
